welcome_message_body: Welcome to Xinjing, China! Get ready to immerse yourself in the rich history and vibrant culture of this charming city known for its beautiful parks, traditional tea houses, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Xinjing has to offer.
